params._requiredAmount: Array of amount of gas that each strategy requires to execute
params._strategies: Array of addresses of strategies to add

params._requiredAmount: Amount of gas that the strategy requires to execute
params._strategy: Address of the strategy to add
Address of the strategy to be worked
Address of the strategy to remove

params._gasBonus: New amount of gas to add to cover unaccounted gas

params._gasMultiplier: New multiplier that boosts gas record to calculate the keeper reward

params._keep3r: Address of the new Keep3r contract

params._keep3rHelper: Address of the new Keep3rHelper contract

params._age: Amount of seconds since keeper registration required to work the job
params._bond: Address of the token required to bond to work the job
params._earned: Amount of KP3R earnings required to work the job
params._minBond: Amount of tokens required to bond to work the job

params._maxMultiplier: New maximum acceptable gasMultiplier to be set

params._mechanicsRegistry: Address of the new MechanicsRegistry contract

params._onlyEOA: Whether the keeper is required to be an EOA or not

params._paused: Whether the contract should be paused or not

params._pendingGovernor: Address of the proposed new governor

params._v2Keeper: Address of the new v2Keeper to set

params._workCooldown: Amount of seconds to wait until a strategy can be worked again

params._requiredAmount: New amount of gas that te strategy requires to execute
params._strategy: Address of the strategy to modify

params._requiredAmounts: Array of new amounts of gas that each strategy requires to execute
params._strategies: Array of addresses of strategies to modify

params._strategy: Address of the strategy to be worked
Address of the strategy to query

returns._isWorkable: Whether the queried strategy is workable or not

KeeperNotValid().notice: Throws when a keeper fails the validation

NoChangeInPause().notice: Throws when governor tries to switch pause to the same state as before

OnlyEOA().notice: Throws when keeper is not tx.origin

OnlyGovernor().notice: Throws if a non-governor user tries to call a OnlyGovernor function

OnlyGovernorOrMechanic().notice: Throws when a OnlyGovernorOrMechanic function is called from an unknown address

OnlyPendingGovernor().notice: Throws if a non-pending-governor user tries to call a OnlyPendingGovernor function

Paused().notice: Throws when a keeper tries to work a paused contract

StrategyAlreadyAdded().notice: Throws if the strategy being added has already been added

StrategyNotAdded().notice: Throws if the strategy being summoned is not added

StrategyNotWorkable().notice: Throws if a keeper tries to work a non-workable strategy

WrongLengths().notice: Throws if a set of correlated input param arrays differ in lengths

ZeroAddress().notice: Throws if a variable is assigned to the zero address

ZeroCooldown().notice: Throws if the cooldown is being set to 0

ForceWorked(address).notice: Emitted when a strategy is force-worked by governor or mechanic

GasBonusSet(uint256).notice: Emitted when a new gas bonus amount is set

GasMetered(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a metered job is worked

GasMultiplierSet(uint256).notice: Emitted when a new gas bonus multiplier is set

Keep3rHelperSet(address).notice: Emitted when a new Keep3rHelper contract is set

Keep3rRequirementsSet(address,uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when a new set of requirements is set

Keep3rSet(address).notice: Emitted when a new Keep3r contract is set

KeeperWorked(address).notice: Emitted when a strategy is worked

MaxMultiplierSet(uint256).notice: Emitted when a new gas bonus multiplier maximum is set

PauseSet(bool).notice: Emitted when the contract pause is switched

PendingGovernorAccepted(address).notice: Emitted when a new governor is set

PendingGovernorSet(address,address).notice: Emitted when a new pending governor is set

StrategyAdded(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a new strategy is added

StrategyModified(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a strategy is modified

StrategyRemoved(address).notice: Emitted when a strategy is removed

acceptPendingGovernor().notice: Allows a proposed governor to accept the governance

forceWork(address).notice: Function to be called by governor or mechanics that triggers the execution of the given strategyThis function bypasses the workable checks

setGasBonus(uint256).notice: Allows governor to set a new gas bonus amount

setGasMultiplier(uint256).notice: Allows governor to set a new gas multiplier

setKeep3r(address).notice: Allows governor to set a new Keep3r contract

setKeep3rHelper(address).notice: Allows governor to set a new Keep3rHelper contract

setKeep3rRequirements(address,uint256,ui.notice: Allows the governor to set new requirements to work the job

setMaxMultiplier(uint256).notice: Allows governor to set a new gas multiplier maximum

setMechanicsRegistry(address).notice: Allows governor to set a new MechanicsRegistry contract

setOnlyEOA(bool).notice: Allows governor to set the onlyEOA condition

setPause(bool).notice: Allows governor to pause or unpause the contract

setPendingGovernor(address).notice: Allows a governor to propose a new governor

work(address).notice: Function to be called by the keeper that triggers the execution of the given strategy
